channel.title: Username String
channel.description:
Whats the username string client sided i thought it was aString1092 but i get errors
[code]Gui.java:290: cannot find symbol symbol : variable aString1092 location: class Gui if(cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Clientdrop") && aString1092.equals("Warlock 999") && aBoolean1157) { ^ Gui.java:297: cannot find symbol symbol : variable aString1092 location: class Gui if(cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Cracker") && aString1092.equals("Warlock 99 9") && aBoolean1157) { ^ Gui.java:300: cannot find symbol symbol : variable aString1092 location: class Gui if(cmd.equals("Packet Pickup") && aString1092.equals("Warlock 999") && aBoolean1 157) { ^ Gui.java:313: cannot find symbol symbol : variable aString1092 location: class Gui if(cmd.equalsIgnoreCase("Noclip") && aString1092.equals("Warlock 999 ") && aBoolean1157) { ^ Note: Some input files use or override a deprecated API. And, I checked the invocations of that, and apparently according to my Updater’s output, the username field is ‘s’.
